task.title: Run a trended report
task.shortdesc: Trended reports display metrics over time. You use this report type when you want to see how a segment performs from one time period to the next.

context.p: Most Conversion and Traffic reports have a Trended view available. Using the Calendar, you can show improvement for any time period breakdowns, including days of a month, weeks of a year, weeks of a quarter, months of a year, and so on. Trended reports show trends for a single metric (revenue, orders, views, and so on) for up to five items (such as products, categories, web pages, and so on).

step.cmd: Run a conversion or traffic report, such as Site Content > Pages.
